channel.title: Help! syipkpker! can't get rid!
channel.description: WE MADE MANY NEW IPS AND THEY ARE JUST FOLLOWING US!!! THEY SEEM TO GET OUR NEW IP SOMEHOW! wHAT DO I DO? THEY RUIN ALL THE NEW ONES!!!

item.title: Help! syipkpker! can't get rid!
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

hasumon:

Your all idiots tbh he doesnt use a fake ip, the REAL syi program adopts the ips from the already connected players and uses it as its own and when it connects into the packet for logging on, it will show both SYIpkpker(unicodes) and the player which will lead you to ipban innocent players and it wont help, the ipban just doesnt allow the full log in to finish and the program just needs to stop mid point to cause the damage and start again. You need to do meiscooldude’s tut on simple connecting ips so it cannot do any part of the log in process due to the server.java file denying the connection…

i know -.- they all just **** out their mouth.
and what i did is banned all syipkpkers
just like syipkpker to syipkpker100 and it helped.
I even tested it but one thing if they use other names they still
can enter -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Help! syipkpker! can't get rid!

item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

puffcake:

then click on your run command prompt thing where you getting spammed right click select all so it freezes it, screenie get the full ip and just type it in bannedip’s

Not as easy as that. See the SYIPKER uses a fake ip…which shows the IP Connection. So everytime it logs on he will ahve a different ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! syipkpker! can't get rid!
item.dc:creator: @puffcake puffcake
item.description:
@puffcake wrote:

public int kickTimer = 0;
public void badNames() {
if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&")
|| playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">")
|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”) || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains(“fuck”) || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains(“syipkpker”) || playerName.contains("***") || playerName.contains(“bitch”)) {
if(kickTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back.");
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
kickTimer = 20;
}

that is what i have in the start of my client.java and it auto bans them like that

Read full topic
